items.question: Fatigue
items.description: Are you fatigued most or all of the time?

items.question: Resistance
items.description: Can you walk up one flight of stairs without help?

items.question: Ambulation
items.description: Can you walk one block without help?

items.question: Illnesses
items.description: Do you have more than 5 illnesses?

items.question: Loss of weight
items.description: Have you lost more than 5% of your weight in the past 6 months?
